title: Any cool new websites/apps using the API?

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: Use the discussion page to request changes to the list, someone with the API namespace editor rights will edit the list.

comments.author: rapthorne.7345
comments.body:
Stephane Lo Presti.7258:

There’s a list of apps and websites using the API on the wiki: http://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/API:List_of_applications

I’ve added the 3 sites above but anyone (including app/site authors) can edit the page to add and complete information!

any chance of getting the sticky at the top of this forum either updated or unstickied?

comments.author: Wanze.8410
comments.body:
HawkMeister.4758:

Uhm, I missed this one.
What´s new with the API making it cooler now?
Thanks in advance.

IF you click on “my Account” on top, you will be able to create API keys that pull certain information from your account, depending what info you check.

Trading Post API pulls value and volume of all your current listings and buy orders and your trading history (for up to 90 days).

Characters and Inventory API pulls info about the items in your bags, bank and mat storage, so you can easily calculate their value. Not sure, what else the character API also pulls on information but i think you will eventually be able to display your build, skins etc, so you dont have to manually put it into build calculators, if you want to share it with others.

The Guild API is still in developement, I think it will make guild organisation much easier for guild leaders and will include info about members different classes, levels, builds, calculating the value of items in the guild vault, login times etc.

comments.author: NTDK.4897
comments.body:
https://www.gw2shinies.com/

Go to Account (you need to create an account there which is pretty easy). And make an API key with all options. Then you can view your bank, inventory on each character, TP transaction….

the website also has some very cool tools

comments.author: fishball.7204
comments.body:
The new API lets you look at the materials in your collectables and the bank.

The API for calculating materials seems down atm though, so only bank works.

Example: http://www.gw2bank.info

comments.author: Wanze.8410
comments.body:
daksh.2176:

Anyone know of any cool websites or iPhone apps that use the api? Specifically looking for tp and bank ones. Thanks in advance

I regularly check into gw2bltc.com with my trading api key. It still has some hick ups but it got some nice features, like flipping summary, trading history per item, tax reports and alarms, if you should get outbid or undercut.

Havent seen any good ones for bank/guild api yet, waiting for an app to calculate the value of all my storage, though.

Shouldnt be long.
